EmailTemplate.subject: Increase IT Productivity by 40%
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/improve-it-staff-productivity/cisco-professional-services#]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Do you and your team struggle to find time in your day to focus on innovation? Are you bogged down by a seemingly endless backlog of work? You're not alone. A top professional services firm faced this same challenge <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/improve-it-staff-productivity/cisco-professional-services#]]>.
Given the complexity of their environment, the firm's IT organization struggled to understand the end-to-end relationships between workloads and the underlying infrastructure. They were perpetually consumed by labor-intensive operational tasks. Then they turned to Turbonomic.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/improve-it-staff-productivity/cisco-professional-services#]]>
Within 1-3 days of implementing the Turbonomic platform, the team increased their productivity by more than 40%, improved VM performance and density up to 59%, and reduced user-generated tickets by more than 40%.
Did we peak your interest yet? Take a closer look; see Turbonomic for yourself! <[[https://turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial?utm_source=nurture&utm_campaign=Turbo-intro]]>
Regards, Team Turbonomic
